Interface TemperatureSensor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Controllable, NumericMeasurementInstrument, SmartThing

    public interface TemperatureSensor
extends SmartThing, Controllable, NumericMeasurementInstrument
    A Sensor that measure temperature, as an integer
